flawed_nl_solution:
Excluding Clarissa, there are 7 + 10 + 9 = <<7+10+9=26>>26 photos.
Clarissa needs to bring 40 - 26 = <<40-26=41>>41 photos to complete the photo album.
#### 41

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 14, not 41. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
